snippet: Roman Catholic bishops issued a proclamation on Thursday calling on believers to defend religious liberty, which they said is “under attack, both at home and abroad.”
abstract: Roman Catholic bishops issue a proclamation calling for every priest, parish and layperson to participate in a 'great national campaign' to defend religious liberty, which they characterize as being under attack.
lead_paragraph: Roman Catholic bishops issued a proclamation on Thursday calling on believers to defend religious liberty, which they said is “under attack, both at home and abroad.”

headline.main: Catholic Bishops Urge Campaign for Religious Freedom
headline.print_headline: Catholic Bishops Urge Campaign for Religious Freedom
